parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mid drive shaft can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the mid shaft can cause the motorcycle to lose control, leading to accidents and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: and the rider may experience loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drive shaft can cause the motorcycle to lose control, leading to accidents and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: and the rider may experience loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The dislodged drive shaft bolt can cause substantial engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the rider stranded. In extreme cases, it can also cause loss of control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Loud whining noise upon release of the throttle
potential loss of power or control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure Due to Drive Shaft Bolt Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the rider stranded. In addition, the cost of repairs can be substantial.
